org.unc.lac.baboon.annotations

Annotation Type GuardProvider


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=METHOD)
public @interface GuardProvider
    This annotation should be used on methods. A method annotated with GuardProvider is automatically resolved and registered after an ActionController object is created. The methods annotated with GuardProvider are used by Baboon Framework to get the boolean flag of the guard declared on its value() attribute, so a method annotated with GuardProvider must have a boolean return type. Also a method annotated with GuardProvider must not accept parameters on its signature. The value() attribute must contain the name of the guard whose boolean value is to be provided by the method.
    Author:
    Ariel Ivan Rabinovich, Juan Jose Arce Giacobbe

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      java.lang.String value
      Method to access the name of the guard configured on the annotation.

    • Element Detail

      • value

        public abstract java.lang.String value
        Method to access the name of the guard configured on the annotation.
        Returns:
        The name of the guard whose boolean value is to be provided by the method.
